# devtoolverse

The goal of `devtoolverse` is to make it easy to install and subsequently load
packages needed for development of R packages.

## Installation

You can install the `devtoolverse` from `GitHub`:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("IndrajeetPatil/devtoolverse")
```

Loading the package-
```{r load}
## load devtoolverse
library(devtoolverse)
```
